mapper.select: select tsum.user_id,tsum.module_id,tsum.remarks,tsm.module_url url from t_sys_user_module tsum left join t_sys_module tsm on tsum.module_id = tsm.module_id where tsum.user_id = #{userId} and tsm.enable = 1 and tsm.module_type = 1 and tsm.super_module_id = '0' order by tsm.module_rank desc
mapper.delete: delete from t_sys_user_module where user_id in (${delUserIds}) and module_id in (${delModuleIds})
